body:
I am following the developer workflow to install my product dependencies and before generating spconfig.py, I got this error : ==> Error: 'SPACK_DEPENDENCIES'

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack setup parmetis
...
```

### Origin

It seems this bug is related to 8ca384875efffbcee1881db9fdef4399e74add50.
title: Error SPACK_DEPENDENCIES when running spack setup
